text: Elias Nilsson, (born 1 April 1910 in Stugun, Sweden, died 9 November 2001 in Lit, Sweden) was a Swedish cross-country skier. In 1938, he won the Vasaloppet. == References == Category:1910 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Swedish male cross-country skiers Category:Vasaloppet winners
title: Elias Nilsson
